feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.19
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 440ada464 Merge pull request #3259 from Infisical/feat/automated-instance-bootstrapping
  • 3944e20a5 Merge pull request #3257 from Infisical/feat/addFileImportToSecretSetCLI
  • 049f0f56a misc: added env support for the other cli flags
  • f059d65b4 misc: finalized response
  • d91add2e7 misc: added return statements
  • ad6f285b5 Throw if file and args secrets are used on secret set command
  • d4842dd27 Improve secret set --file message and make it mutually exclusive with manual secrets args
  • 64569ab44 feat: added bootstrap to CLI
  • 838c1af44 Add file option to secret set CLI command to retrieve secrets from .env or .yaml files

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.20
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 54b13a9da feat: resolved small gateway issues and added gateway uninstall command

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.118.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add recursive flag to folders get endpoint to retrieve all nested folders by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3293

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.36.20...infisical/v0.118.0-postgres

What's Changed

  • fix: k8s installation failing by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3252
  • Fix: Handle Disabled/Destroyed Values in GCP Sync by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3243
  • fix: corrected table name check in migration by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3260
  • Add dynamic secrets modal form on secrets overview page by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3241
  • Feat/metadata OIDC by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3242
  • Feature: Disable Secret Deletion Sync Option by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3246
  • Minor changes to oidc claims and mappings by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3265
  • feat(helm): custom volume support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3270
  • Add file option to secret set CLI command to retrieve secrets from .env or .yaml files by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3257
  • feat: automated bootstrapping by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3259
  • Universal Auth doc improvement to show US/EU API URLs by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3275
  • Bulk Delete Secret Incorrectly says lacking permission by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3274
  • fix(k8s): remove required field from operator helm by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3277
  • feat: added log and updated license ttl to 5min by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3279
  • feat: added k8s abort by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3280
  • docs(hsm): kubernetes deployment HSM docs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3278
  • Permission metadata data in audit log by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3272
  • misc: add event loop stats by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3282
  • misc: add flag for disabling workers by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3284
  • feat: return fastify res and making it async by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3285
  • feat: removed refresh by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3286
  • Fix/patch 4 by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3287
  • Indexed and optimized folder queries by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3276
  • Add Windmill custom api url domain by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3268
  • Show when folders have imports in secret overview page by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3264
  • Remove dragons from /signupinvite and /requestnewinvite by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3291
  • docs: added apache airflow link by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3294
  • K8s short lived reviewer jwt support by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3292
  • Gateway minor fixes by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3295
  • Add recursive flag to folders get endpoint to retrieve all nested folders by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3293

New Contributors

  • @0xArshdeep made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3288

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.117.1-postgres...infisical/v0.118.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.36.21
entry.content:
Changelog

  • d4728e31c Keep Domains on writeInitalConfig for CLI login

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.118.1-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Additional validation for dynamic secret by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3299
  • Rework of secret imports on the overview page by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3303
  • Resolved ip getting populated in form by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3305
  • Keep Domains on writeInitalConfig for CLI login by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3298
  • feat: client secret compare optimization in machine identity login by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3309
  • Allow project approval workflows to set if a reviewer can or can not review their own requests by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3301

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.118.0-postgres...infisical/v0.118.1-postgres
